select1.label: Select district
Respondent type
Select gender of the farmer
Select farmer's / HH (decision maker) education level

input.label: Total land holding of farmer (ask either in bigha or kattha)

select1.label: Land unit
Are you using precision fertilizer spreader?

input.label: Since how long are you using this? (number of years)

select1.label: For what purpose are you using the spreader?

select.label: For which crops are you using the spreader?

input.label: In how much area did you use spreader during last rice season? (ask in "Kattha")
In how much area did you use spreader during last wheat season? (ask in "Kattha")

select1.label: How was the crop yield after the use of spreader?

input.label: How much was the increment in percentage in rice? (%)
How much was the increment in percentage in wheat? (%)

select1.label: Did the spreader save time?
Was there uniformity in broadcasting by spreader use?
Is it cost saving?

input.label: Enter hour required to broadcasting using spreader (ask in "Bigha")
Enter hour required to broadcasting manually (ask in "Bigha")

select1.label: Is it easy to operate?
Are there any hazards while operating spreader?
Is there any drudgery in operating spreader?

input.label: Women's perception on PRECISION SPREADER use in this same household

select1.label: Is the spreader also used by female household members?
Rate the spreader whether it is women friendly.
Rate satisfaction on the use of spreader.
Rate easyness in operation.
Is is helpful for timely application of seeds or fertilizers?

Who provided the training?

select.label: In your opinion, how this technology can be scaled out?
